series_description: This series documents the agreement, cost, and funding of urban road construction projects. This series may include, but not limited to : agreements, and road construction documentation.

This series documents secondary road projects that are by monies provided to counties solely from the state's coal severance tax program. This series may include, but is not limited to: applications and correspondence

series_title: Federal Funding Records: National Forest Highways and Land Highways (Federal)
series_description: This series documents plans for the expenditure of federal money allocated each year by the Federal Highway Administration (FHWA) to the state for national forest and land highway projects. This series may include, but is not limited: applications, annual meeting minutes, plans, and correspondence.

This series documents the locality, location, mileage, classification, and lane miles of urban city and town streets are maintained with state funds. This series may include but is not limited to: inventory and supporting documentation.
retention_statement: 0 Years after superseded, obsolete, or rescinded

series_description: This series documents the allocation of funds for each fiscal year in the Revenue Sharing Program (RSP) . This series may include, but is not limited to: reports, funding, and support documentation.

This series documents the request for funding by a local government for a new road or improvement to an existing road that will provide or increase access to airports, recreational areas, or industrial sites. This series may include, but is not limited to:road costs, requests, resolutions, drawings, site and correspondence.
This series documents requests from municipalities to add existing city and town roads to the urban road inventory. This series may include, but is not limited to: correspondence.
This series documents annual inspections by resident of urban [locality] streets maintained with state funds. This series may include, but is not limited to: inspection reports and findings.

This series documents certified quarterly payments to urban localities for streets maintained with state funds. This series may include, but is not limited to: certification and payment documentation.
retention_statement: 0 Years after superseded, obsolete, or rescinded

series_description: This series documents agreements and approvals related to Transportation Enhancement/Alternative program. This series may include, but is not limited to: status reports, agreements, approved applications, and correspondence.
This series documents requests from urban localities to waive urban system requirements mandated by the
legal_citation: Code of Virginia. This series may include, but is not limited to: requests for waivers and correspondence.
